application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.5 Apple - Fell.T.6 Wild Cherry - Remove dead sections, leaving a small proportion (up to 0.5m) as habitat. T.7 Sycamore - 3m Holistic crown reduction to previous points.T.8 Common Lime - 3m Holistic crown reduction to previous points.T.9 Lawson Cypress - Crown Lift to 3m from ground level.	T.10 Sycamore - 3m Holistic crown reduction to previous points.T.11 Cherry - Fell (dead).T.12 Silver Birch - 3.5m Holistic crown reduction to previous points.	T.13 Silver Birch - 3.5m Holistic crown reduction to previous points.
